alert.note: Alert for Conecuh; Covington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 8:46AM CDT until April 03 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Conecuh County in south central Alabama... Northwestern Covington County in south central Alabama... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 846 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of I65 And US 84, or 6 miles northwest of Evergreen, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Andalusia, Evergreen, River Falls, Red Level, Repton, Heath, Gantt and I65 And US 84. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for south central Alabama.
